text: ape rate widwathunge danuma pramanawath nowanne nam widesha thakshanika sahaya ho labagena mewani gatalu sandaha pahadili wisandum labadimata hakiyawa thibiya di eya mangaharima barapathala waradak.

godak wela kalpana kalath kisima ayidiyawak aawe na.okkotama wada hithe thibba baya nisa wenna athi ehema wenna aththe.monawa unath kad kudu karaganna ba ne.ehema unoth gedarinuth yanna weyi.game innath bari weyi.eeth mage lagath watina deyak thiyenawane.kohoma unath akka kamathi unoth hama deyakma harine..kamathi nowunoth thamayi awula thiyenne..mewa hithala hithala mage oluwath pissu watila wage….

nirmanaya kala haki ya.
mama husmak gannam
ehi pa්ramanaya pruthiwiye pa්ramanayata aasanna weyi.
warthamanaye karmika wanija yugaya hewath ilektronika yugaya da ikmanin awasan wegana yamin pawathi.
(sinhala bauddha manasa mayen athi lipiyehi me bawa sakachcha weyi.)
kalana gunasekara nam ohu kumbaiyo teli natyaye thawath ek prabala charithayak.
awith eya baladdi eya hariyata puduma wuna.
dan ithin ara eda kiwwa wage thaththage ala tika wawaganna."

ema niwasata allapu niwase siti sthriyak piyayuru pilika rogayen pelena bawa dana gannata haki wiya.
namuth eya eseya.
harak horu okkoma!
gunadasa kapuge shurin wisin gayu senehe sithin sanasillen kiyana githaya mata mathak una, pudumakara harayak ee githaye thiyenawa....

anwar mehidi adahas kara aththe ema bhikshun wahansela siwuru porawa gath samanya minisun bawata pathwi athi bawaya.
rathgamaya tharahen pipiri pipiri hitiddi waradda ape nisa mama kiwwa.
owunta anuwa me aparadha nathi wanne aagam naththata ma nathiwunu data ya.
sathiyakata wathawak ohu / aya niweswala charikawaka yede.
dan dan penenne ee pera nimithi ya.
eeta samantharawa mahacharya dayas aarakshaka walallakata madi kotagena apa idiriyata adune wikalpa magak lesa sarasawi krida bhumiya osse wati athi adipara digeyi.
ee wagema parlimenthuwa niyojanaya karana manthi්rawarunuth me panathen siddha wenna puluwan pa්rajathnatha්ra wirodhi katayuththa therum aragena erehi weyi kiyala api balaporoththu wenawa.
namuth mewa karaganima aniwarya natha.
mema pakisthanu jathikayin 20 dena athara kanthawan dedeneku da wana bawa chulananda perera mahatha kiya sitiyi.
kata hari una ganunoth, (wisheshayen dengu bahula pradeshayaka) eya ee sanin gedara gihin net ekak athule inna oone...
meya ohuta puduma gena dennak wiya.
horen nam neweyi.
nidasunak lesa wishalathama wi waga kannaya wana maha kannayata adalawa wishala pohora hingayak athiwi thibenawa.
ehenan sayibar sihina bakmaha uleledi hamuwemu.
ehenam menna sabandiyawa.
kolambaa kanthoruwala welawa ..
me gollanta ee wiruddhathwaya pala kala.
unwahanse me pilibandawa pawasa sitiye rajagiriya jayashekhararama wiharasthanaye eeye (5 wanida) pawathi madhya hamuwakadiya.

pa්rabala satanak dimata tharam jawipe shakthimath thanaka nowuyen nambukara widiyata satanen iwathwimata owun yodagath upaka්ramayaki chandrakagen widhayaka janadhipathi dhuraya ahosikirime likhitha poronduwak ganima . 2005 di jawipe mahinda rajapakshata ee sandaha 6 wasaraka sahana kalayak labadi atha.
man diha balana hama ekama mawa kanda enawa wageth penda gaththa.....
eka amma kenek mata kiwwa mama rangapapu napuru charithaya dakina wita ti.wi. eka polowe gahanna hithenawa kiyala.
ithin anekwa gana kawara kathada?
man nathi tika siya blog ekakuth atogena...
numbaa awidin ma ridawayi...
ee unath kankun tika nam awulak nathuwa jiwath una.
owunata erehiwa waradak sidu wi athi witadi randewiyanta menma owunge pawul wala samajikayantath ee wenuwen wandi illimata hakiyawakda mema sammuthiya magin laba di atha.
yaluwonta risults kiwwama...
pansal waththe hitapu game udawiya boho denek thamanta banna kiyala mathakayi.
in anathuruwa kumarawaru kensingtan maligaye sankan udyanaya narambaimata giya athara, eya mema wasare sita dayana kumariyata upahara lesa dhawala udyanaya lesa nam kerini.
pasugiya kalaye boliwudaye puwath athare wadima awadhanayak yomu wi thibune dipika – ranwir saha priyanka – nik aadara katha wethatayi.
eeken apita athdakim wala watinakama kiyala nima karanna baha.
thamanta mokak hari loku hithe wedanawak thiyanawa nam rata nida ganna kalin widuru piganak uda lunu kudu thuniwa athurala eeke hari madin hatharata kapapu leman gediyak thiyanna.
mata nam eeke ganak na...
mema tankiyata damana maluwan gana aarakshaka lekamta awabodhayak thibune natha.
owun thama sthawaraya padanam karagaththe saba awabodhayak wenuwata charithra, nithiya saha bahira penuma anugamanaya kirima mathaya.
heta thawath aya eewi
ee athare selfon wikunana welendoth hitiya.
ee palath sima nirna warthawa bhara ganima sambandhawa madhya idiriye wikara rupi natakayak rangapameni.
ee wenuwen palaka panthiya uparima uthsahayaka niratha wenawa.
ee kathawa aththa thamayi!

shri.la.ni.pa athulu paksha janadhipathiwaranayata podu wadapiliwelak thula muhuna dimata sudanam nowi wenama tharaga wadimath samanga ewakatath thahanamwa thibu ja.wi.pe hamuwe pawathi ekama kriyamargaya wuye, janadhipathiwaranaya warjanaya kirimaya.

ese thibiya di, ‘mathata thitha’ gana lokuwata katha kirima pasupasa aththe, sadahathi bauddha chundadayakaya gonata andawima aramunu karagath bala drushtiwadayak pamanak bawa kenekuta pahadili wiya yuthuya.jathikawadi, deshiyawadi, aagamikawadi eeniya sha්raddhawaka (wisheshayen yuda jayaga්rahanayen pasuwa) ape deshapalanaya sthanagatha kota athi thaththwaya thula, ema janathawage sith sanasena aagamika saha jathika wijjawan nirantharayen penwime awashyathawa deshapalanagnyayage paththen mathuweyi.
demala janathawa saha aanduwa athara wishwasayak athiwela apa athare ekathuwimak athi nowunoth eke paduwa siduwanne ratatamayi.

kopawishta kamkaruwange wirodhatha rallakin pasuwa, yueedabliw sabhapathi dites angaharuwada prakashayak nikuth karamin kiya sitiye, yueedabliw “obe konthrath illim ho awashyatha sapuralanne nathi jiem yojanawak” prathikshepa kala bawa yi.
meki athurudahan wuwange karyalaya shri lankawe nithiya kriyathmaka kirime ho yukthiya pasandalime aayathana paddhathiye kotasak wanne natha.
saruwa lingikawa hasirune ohugen mudal saha wasi laba ganna kamaththen eyata anubala dun pudgalayan ekka kiyala thamayi ee palathe aya kiyanne.

kiyalaithin me welawe ethumata mathak wela thiyenawa ee aya awurudu ganak prema karala wiwaha unu widiya.ee kale liyapu liyum,karapu kiyapu dewal ehema.ithin me wele githa rachakayata hithila thiyanawa me wage koyi tharam liyum liyala aadaraya karala ekathu unath wen wennath hethu sadaka athi wenawa neda kiyala.oya siduwima matha padaka wela bihi unu nirmanayak thamayi oba eda nam sanda wage mayi.....

namuth ath adanguwata gath dagabak wanasu padadayin dedenata labune rupiyal 25,000 bagin wu dadayaki.

mahajana kalambaim athi karana ha rajaya kerehi janathawa kalakirawana mebandu ranganayan da nithi wirodhi ya.
hele garajaya, yuniliwar eejansiya aadi boho man salakunu ehemama nisa awarithuma bohoma sulu welawakin niwasa wetha aawa.
aparadha, giwisum, thoratha, depala saha bhara nithi ' sampa ් radayika madh ya wishayan ' lesin handunwanu labe.
ehi sandahan no wana thahanam wachana dekak atha.
